long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mood Tracker - Your Daily Mood Journal & Motivation Companion

Boost your day with Mood Tracker, the Chrome extension that helps you check in with your emotions, track your mood, and receive inspiring tips to uplift your spirit. Mood Tracker makes self-reflection simple and enjoyable, providing an easy way to log your daily feelings and understand what’s behind them, while offering positive insights to brighten your day and keep you motivated.

Key Features:
Effortless Mood Logging: Choose from a range of moods that reflect how you’re feeling, add a personal note on what’s driving your emotions, and keep track of your journey over time.
Daily Motivational Tips: Each time you log your mood, Mood Tracker provides a fresh, motivational tip to boost your day and support your emotional wellness.
Mood History: View past entries to gain insights into your emotional patterns, track trends, and celebrate progress.
One-Click Inspiration: Click “Get a New Tip” anytime to receive a dose of encouragement and positivity whenever you need it.
With Mood Tracker, take control of your emotional well-being and let small moments of self-care add up to big, positive changes. Ideal for anyone looking to build healthier habits, manage stress, and stay mindful each day.
